title: Ghosts Never Sleep [20045][DVDRip][Mp4]
description:
The drama Ghosts Never Sleep stars Tony Goldwyn as a struggling screenwriter who might have finally scored a successful sale with a screenplay that tells a story that might cost him his relationship with both his mother and his wife. The script is strikingly similar to a real tragic event that happened in his family, an event that his mother (Faye Dunaway) wants no one to know about.



Director:  Steve Freedman 
Writers:   Steve Freedman, Christopher Joyce 
Cast:      Tony Goldwyn
